column1: Smoque BBQ////I had Smoque cater my birthday party last Sunday. About 20 people. We had brisket
column6: and cornbread. They arrived on time
column8: and were gone without so much as a ripple of disturbance. The food was excellent. Our guests who had eaten at Smoque before were delighted to see them show up with the food. Those who were new to Smoque raved about it.  But best of all
column9: the owners of the apartments above us asked us tonight if there had been a fire Sunday because they smelled smoke. And that
column11: is all the testimonial you could ever need.  I'm only going to be 75 once
column12: and I'm really happy I had Smoque cater the event.
